[vc_row cth_layout=”monolit_page_sec” sec_number=”01″ el_id=”sec1″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-8″][vc_column_text]

Our Awesome Story

Pipra is a small, intensely design-oriented architectural firm, founded in 2015. Based in Dhaka, Bangladesh, the multidisciplinary firm was established with the intent to provide complete, high-level design services for the full range of projects within the built environment, including residential, commercial, industrial and institutional projects.

Our team takes over everything, from an idea and concept development to realization. We believe in traditions and incorporate them into our innovations. All our projects incorporate a unique artistic image and functional solutions. The client is the soul of the project. Our main goal is to illustrate his/her values and individuality through design.

What we do

  • Commercial
  • Housing
  • Industrial
  • Vacation house
  • Interior
  • Institutional
  • Residential
  • Restaurant
  • Mosque & islamic Research centre

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″][monolit_parallax_box box_pos=”center”][/monolit_parallax_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cth_layout=”monolit_page_dark_sec” parallax_inner_op=”0.8″ sec_number=”02″ sec_number_pos=”left” parallax_inner=”625″ el_id=”sec2″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text]

Our Skills

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-md-8″][vc_column_text]

During first phase Interior Design was the main focus of Pipra. Why? To have a wide experience for functions, use, and arrangement of different spaces, detail of design with the availability of materials, how to make a space user-friendly. Then after few years gradually started work together with Architecture and related Engineering Designs like structural, electromechanical along with Landscape and Graphic Designs. The Firm’s body of work includes Residential, Commercial & Industrial Complex, Restaurants, Leisure and Amusement Complex, Office and Multi-storied Commercial Buildings, Real Estate Projects, Institutional, and Industrial Facilities, etc.
